Key Match Events: Anthony Volpe hit a grand slam in the third inning
Gleyber Torres added a home run
Alex Verdugo hit an RBI grounder in the second inning
Wells hit a second-deck homer in the sixth against Landon Knack
Torres hit a three-run homer off Brent Honeywell in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone expressed pride in the team's resilience
Aaron Judge drove in his first run of the Series with an RBI single in the eighth
Miscellaneous Highlights: Freddie Freeman hit another first-inning home run
Freeman became the first player to homer in the first four games of a World Series
Los Angeles closed within 6-4 in a two-run fifth
Wells and Gleyber Torres added homers for the Yankees
The Yankees avoided what would have been their first losing Series sweep since 1976
